visitor-guideline.title: Visitor Guideline
visitor-guideline.guideline-1: Go to the visitor’s registration page at
visitor-guideline.guideline-3: Enter your active email address. We will send information and notifications to your email.
visitor-guideline.guideline-4: Enter a phone number that’s connected to WhatsApp
visitor-guideline.guideline-5: Enter your full name and title. We will use this for the certificate.
visitor-guideline.guideline-6: Select your job function. If you did not find a suitable one, you can select 'Other'
visitor-guideline.guideline-7: Enter a password and retype your password in 'Confirm Password'
visitor-guideline.guideline-9: Select the type of institution that best describes your company/institution. If you did not found a suitable one, select 'Other'
visitor-guideline.guideline-11: If you choose Indonesia, please select your province
visitor-guideline.guideline-12: Select the visitor type that best suits you
visitor-guideline.guideline-13: Tick the products you are interested in (You can tick as much as possible)
visitor-guideline.guideline-14: Tick your purpose of visiting HEF 2022
visitor-guideline.guideline-15: Select if you have registered in SEHAT RI or not. If you forget or are unsure, you may select 'I Forget'
visitor-guideline.guideline-16: Select I understand and accept the condition.
visitor-guideline.guideline-17: Once you have finished filling in the registration form, click 'Register'. You'll be registered in our system and may login to our website. Further guidelines will be informed later.

who-attend.title: Who Attend?
who-attend.overview: With over 10000 registered members from Indonesia, IAHE is recognised nationally for conducting webinars focusing on hospital engineering. Healthcare professionals across the following industry sectors are represented within our visitor profiles:

why-attend.title: Why Attend?
why-attend.overview: Visitor of HEF 2022 can join 3 days online events for free, including webinar series to networking opportunities with our exhibitors.
why-attend.profit-1: A series of seminars with more than 20 speakers from the government, associations, industry and hospital with Live Q&A in each seminar to facilitate the hospital needs according to standard and affordable.
why-attend.profit-2: Product Presentation, Demo, and Simulation from Exhibitor, followed by a Live Q&A
why-attend.profit-3: Networking with more than 10.000 Hospital Community Members.
why-attend.profit-4: Opportunity to win attractive prizes during the event and also Certificate Provided
